summary: An ordinance relating to and providing for the improvement of Meridian Avenue from North 80th Street to North 85th Street; by constructing concrete sidewalks together with all necessary cross walks; providing for the necessary surface drainage and otherwise improving the same; all in accordance with Resolution No. 8433 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing for that payment for said improvement to be made by special assessment upon property in said district payable by the mode of "Payment in Bonds".
